reports.title: Number of Applications
reports.query: MATCH (sw:Software) RETURN count(sw) AS nr_software_installed

settings.description: Number of running applications for customer services

reports.title: Number of SCA analyses
reports.query:
MATCH p = (sn:Snapshot {type: 'SCA'})-[]-(sw:Software)
RETURN count(p)

settings.description: Number of applications that have produced an SBOM and that have been scanned using Software Composition Analysis

reports.title: SCA adoption rate
reports.query:
MATCH (sw:Software)
OPTIONAL MATCH (sn:Snapshot {type: 'SCA'})-[]-(sw)
RETURN toFloat(count(sn)) / toFloat(count(sw)) * 100

reports.title: DevSecOps analysis tooling
reports.query:
MATCH (vl:Vulnerability|Finding)
RETURN DISTINCT (vl.source) as name

reports.title: Number of SAST analyses
reports.query:
MATCH p = (sn:Snapshot {type: 'SAST'})-[]-(sw:Software)
RETURN count(p)

reports.title: SAST adoption rate
reports.query:
MATCH (sw:Software)
OPTIONAL MATCH (sn:Snapshot {type: 'SAST'})-[]-(sw)
RETURN toFloat(count(sn)) / toFloat(count(sw)) * 100

reports.title: Installed Software
reports.query:
MATCH(sw:Software)<-[:SNAPSHOT_OF]-(:Snapshot)
RETURN DISTINCT sw.swName AS SoftwareName;

reports.title: Vulnerable Open Source Components of $neodash_swName_Snapshot
reports.query:
MATCH (sw:Software {swName: $neodash_swName_Snapshot})<-[:SNAPSHOT_OF]-(sn:Snapshot {type: 'SCA'})<-[:IDENTIFIED_IN]-(sc:SoftwareComponent)
MATCH (sc)-[vo:VULNERABILITY_OF]-(vl:Vulnerability)
RETURN DISTINCT sc.component AS Component, sc.version AS Version

reports.title: Known Vulnerabilities for $neodash_swName_Snapshot
reports.query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (sw:Software {swName: $neodash_swName_Snapshot})<-[:SNAPSHOT_OF]-(sn:Snapshot {type: $neodash_snapshot_type})<-[:IDENTIFIED_IN]-(sc:SoftwareComponent {component: $neodash_sw_component})-[:VULNERABILITY_OF]-(vu:Vulnerability)
RETURN vu.vulnerability_id as cve_id, vu.severity as severity, vu.status as status, vu.fixed_version as fixed_version, vu.link as more_info;

reports.title: Services Affected by Vulerabilities in $neodash_swName_Snapshot
Critical Open Source vulnerabilities
reports.query:
MATCH (sc:SoftwareComponent)-[]->(sn:Snapshot)-[]->(sw:Software)
MATCH critical_p = (vl:Vulnerability)-[]-(sc) WHERE upper(vl.severity) = "CRITICAL"
RETURN sw.swName as Application, count(critical_p) as Vulnerabilities
ORDER BY Vulnerabilities DESC

reports.title: SCA vulnerability severities
reports.query:
MATCH (sc:SoftwareComponent)-[]->(sn:Snapshot)-[]->(sw:Software)
MATCH vuln_p = (vl:Vulnerability)-[]-(sc)
RETURN vl.severity AS Severity, count(vuln_p) as Vulnerabilities

reports.title: Software Structure and Vulnerabilities associated with $neodash_selected_app
reports.query:
MATCH p=(sw:Software {swName: $neodash_selected_app})<-[]-(:Snapshot)<-[]-(:SoftwareComponent)<-[]-(vl:Vulnerability) WHERE upper(vl.severity) = "CRITICAL"
RETURN p

reports.title: Relevant Open Source Components of $neodash_selected_app
reports.query:
MATCH (sc:SoftwareComponent)-[]->(sn:Snapshot)-[]->(sw:Software {swName: $neodash_selected_app})
MATCH critical_p = (vl:Vulnerability)-[]-(sc) WHERE upper(vl.severity) = "CRITICAL"
RETURN sc.component as component, sc.version as version, count(critical_p) as Vulnerabilities
ORDER BY Vulnerabilities DESC

reports.title: CVSS distribution (rounded)
reports.query:
MATCH (sc:SoftwareComponent)-[]->(sn:Snapshot)-[]->(sw:Software)
MATCH vuln_p = (vl:Vulnerability)-[]-(sc)
RETURN toInteger(vl.cvss) AS cvss, count(DISTINCT vuln_p) as Vulnerabilities
ORDER BY cvss

settings.description: Severity score of the CVE (rounded up to integer).

reports.title: Vulnerability Status
reports.query:
MATCH (sc:SoftwareComponent)-[]->(sn:Snapshot)-[]->(sw:Software)
MATCH count_p = (vl:Vulnerability)-[]-(sc)
RETURN DISTINCT vl.status as Status, count(DISTINCT count_p) as Vulnerabilities

reports.title: Search for SW Component
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`SoftwareComponent`)
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`component`)) CONTAINS toLower($input)
RETURN DISTINCT n.`component` AS value, n.`component` AS display
ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC
LIMIT 5

settings.description: Not all components have vulnerabilities. Try spring-web, etc.

reports.title: found vulnerable components
reports.query:
MATCH (sw:Software)<-[:SNAPSHOT_OF]-(sn:Snapshot)<-[:IDENTIFIED_IN]-(sc:SoftwareComponent {component: $neodash_softwarecomponent_component})<-[vo:VULNERABILITY_OF]-(vl:Vulnerability)
RETURN DISTINCT sc.component AS Component, sc.version AS Version, sc.purl AS PURL;

reports.title: Found vulnerable Application-Services
reports.query:
MATCH (sv:Service)
MATCH (sv)-[]-(sw:Software)<-[:SNAPSHOT_OF]-(sn:Snapshot)<-[:IDENTIFIED_IN]-(sc:SoftwareComponent {component: $neodash_softwarecomponent_component})
MATCH (sc)-[vo:VULNERABILITY_OF]-(vl:Vulnerability)
RETURN  DISTINCT sv.serviceName as Service, sw.swName as Application, sv.serviceOwner as `Service Owner`
ORDER BY sw.swName

settings.noDataMessage: No vulnerable software services found for this component!

reports.title: Customers affected in case of critical Vulnerabilities
SAST Findings by severity
reports.query:
MATCH (sn:Snapshot)-[]-(sw:Software)
MATCH critical_p = (fn:Finding)-[]-(sn)
RETURN sw.swName as Application, toUpper(fn.severity) as severity, count(critical_p) as Findings
ORDER BY Findings DESC

reports.title: High SAST findings
reports.query:
MATCH (sn:Snapshot)-[]-(sw:Software)
MATCH critical_p = (fn:Finding)-[]-(sn) WHERE fn.severity IN ["high", "critical"]
RETURN sw.swName as Application, count(DISTINCT critical_p) as Findings
ORDER BY Findings DESC

reports.title: High SAST findings for the selected application $neodash_selected_application
reports.query:
MATCH (sn:Snapshot)-[]-(sw:Software {swName: $neodash_selected_application})
MATCH p = (fn:Finding)-[]-(sn) WHERE fn.severity IN ["critical", "high"]
RETURN fn.title as Title, toUpper(fn.severity) as Severity, fn.link as link, count(DISTINCT p) as Findings
ORDER BY Findings DESC

reports.title: Select Finding from the list below:
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`Finding`)
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`title`)) CONTAINS toLower($input)
RETURN DISTINCT n.`title` AS value, n.`title` AS display
ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC
LIMIT 5

reports.title: Affected Software:
reports.query:
MATCH(fi:Finding {title:  $neodash_finding_title})-[]-(sn:Snapshot)-[]-(:Software)
RETURN DISTINCT sn.ref AS Reference;

reports.title: Select an affected service for $neodash_finding_title
reports.query:
MATCH(fi:Finding {title:  $neodash_finding_title})-[]-(sn:Snapshot { ref: $neodash_finding_snapshot})-[]-(so:Software)-[:RUNS_ON]-(sv:Server)
RETURN DISTINCT so.swVersion AS Version, so.swName AS SoftwareName, sv.serverName AS Server;

reports.title: Server running the Software with Finding $neodash_finding_snapshot
Service Owners to call and their customers
reports.query:
MATCH (fi:Finding {title:  $neodash_finding_title})-[]-(sn:Snapshot {ref: $neodash_finding_snapshot})-[]-(so:Software {swName: $neodash_snapshot_software})-[:RUNS_ON]->(:Server {serverName : $neodash_snapshot_sw_server})-[:RUNS]->(sv:Service)-[:CONSUMED_BY]->(cu:Customer)
RETURN DISTINCT sv.serviceOwner AS ServiceOwner, cu.customerName AS Customer, cu.customerImportance AS Importance ORDER BY Importance DESC;
